title: The Zero Product Property
text: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.
speech: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.
pacedSpeech: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.

title: Factoring the Equation
text: We can factor $$49m^2-144$$ to use the zero product property. $$49m^2-144=\left(7m+12\right) \left(7m-12\right)$$
speech: We can factor  49 m squared, minus, 144  to use the zero product property.  49 m squared minus 144 is equal to parentheses, 7 m plus 12,  times, parentheses, 7 m minus 12,
pacedSpeech: We can factor   49 m squared, minus, 144
to use the zero product property.   49 m squared minus 144 is equal to , 7 m plus 12,  times, , 7 m minus 12,

title: Using the Zero Product Property
text: As per the zero product property, if $$\left(7m+12\right) \left(7m-12\right)=0$$, then either $$7m+12$$ or $$7m-12$$ is equal to $$0$$. Setting both of these to $$0$$, $$m=\frac{-12}{7}$$ or $$m=\frac{12}{7}$$. Summing these values, we get $$0$$
speech: As per the zero product property, if  parentheses, 7 m plus 12,  times, parentheses, 7 m minus 12,  is equal to 0 , then either  7 m, plus 12  or  7 m, minus, 12  is equal to  0 . Setting both of these to  0 ,  m is equal to fraction, negative 12, over 7,   or  m is equal to, 12 sevenths . Summing these values, we get  0
pacedSpeech: As per the zero product property, if   , 7 m plus 12,  times, , 7 m minus 12,  is equal to 0
,   m is equal to fraction, negative 12, over 7,
or   m is equal to, 12 sevenths
